lines.text: Chris, Lee your brother, but he not like you.
We can't go on running forever, Lee.

[upon learning that Jim has stolen the pearls]
Nobody try to stop you?

[to Chris]
What are you trying to do, cross-examine me?
But there is always somebody guarding storehouse. You did not see her?
And she didn't try to stop you?
She won't be stopping anybody for a long time...
I thought I saw something *just* inside the reef.
That is home of shark god Tangaroa. That place taboo. Shark god angry long time now. Bring many bad storms, much bad fortune.
Well he certainly didn't bring *us* any luck. Is there anything we can do to get him in a better humor?
Let us go, Chris. The tide is high; the wind is strong. Let us leave evil behind us.
